text: aur hamane un logon se bhee drdh vachan liya tha, jinhonne kaha tha ki ham nasaara (eesaee) hain, kintu jo kuchh unhen jisake dvaara yaad karaaya gaya tha usaka ek bada bhaag bhula baithe. phir hamane unake beech qiyaamat tak ke lie shatruta aur dvesh kee aag bhadaka dee, aur allaah jald unhen bata dega, jo kuchh ve banaate rahe the
